venue.name: The Museum of Work and Culture

item.description:
Bonjours Printemps Event -- Woonsocket, RI
March 20, 2011
The Museum of Work & Culture will be hosting its annual Salute to Spring/Bonjour Printemps, featuring Sylvain’s Acadian Aces - a 4 member Acadian group from Portland, Maine who will perform foot-stomping Cajun music.  Also during the afternoon, the museum’s popular living history play “The Boarding House” will be performed by museum volunteers. Other attractions include Choir of L’Alliance Française of Providence, French food and delicacies, admissions to the museum’s superb exhibits, and a raffle with a grand prize of a trip for 2 to Montreal, Canada. Location: The Museum of Work and Culture, 42 South Main Street. Time: 1:30 - 5 p.m. Cost: $15. Information: 401-769-9675 www.rihs.org.
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait in lobby where tickets are purchased.
item.why: This will be a little different, music, maybe some dancing, French culture.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: French Culture
